problem:
i,j,k;char s[3001];main(c){for(scanf("%*d");~scanf("%*d%s",s);i=k=0){
j=1;while(s[i++])c=s[i]&1,j^=c,k=j&c?i:k;s[k]=0;puts(k?s:"-1");}}
fixed:
i,j,k;char s[3001];main(c){for(scanf("%*d");~scanf("%*d%s",s);i=k=0){
j=1;while(s[i])c=s[i++]&1,j^=c,k=j&c?i:k;s[k]=0;puts(k?s:"-1");}}

problem: long long t,n,k,c;main(){for(;~scanf("%lld",t?n?&k:&n:&t);k?printf("%lld\n",c),c=k=0:0)for(;k&&n;n/=k)c+=n%k+1;}
fixed: long long t,n,k,c;main(){for(;~scanf("%lld",t?n?&k:&n:&t);k?printf("%lld\n",c-1),c=k=0:0)for(;k&&n;n/=k)c+=n%k+1;}
